Detailed Description

Abstract base class for predictive input-mappers.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum PredInputMapper::PredMode
 

Predictive Input methods.

Enumerator:
PredEnglish 
PredMultiTap  e.g. 3 taps to get C from a key marked ABC.
PredPinyin  Simplified Chinese Phonetic.
PredSimplifiedChineseStroke 
PredTraditionalChineseStroke 
PredBpmf  Traditional Chinese Phonetic.
PredNone 
PredSymbol 
PredArabic 
PredThai 
PredThaiMatrix 
PredHebrew 

enum PredInputMapper::Type
 

Enumerator:
T9  Uses the predictive input method T9.
Zi8  Uses the predictive input eZi text.
